extensionAttribute.description: This attribute returns the Virus Definitions Date for ClamXav. This attribute template applies to ClamXav (v 2.0.5).
extensionAttribute.scriptContentsMac: #!/bin/sh #This script has been verified to work on ClamXav (v 2.0.5). #Check to see if ClamXav is installed if [ -f "/usr/local/clamXav/bin/freshclam" ]; then result=`/bin/date -j -f "%b %d %Y" "$(/usr/local/clamXav/bin/freshclam --version | sed s:/:\ :g | awk '{print $5, $6, $8}')" "+%Y-%m-%d 00:00:00"` echo "<result>$result</result>" else echo "<result>Not installed</result>" fi
